typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPLOYEE_ID as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		HIRE_DATE as string,
		JOB_ID as string,
		SALARY as string,
		COMMISSION_PCT as string,
		MANAGER_ID as string,
		DEPARTMENT_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		DEPARTMENT_ID as string,
		DEPARTMENT_NAME as string,
		MANAGER_ID as string,
		LOCATION_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceDepartments
source1 aggregate(groupBy(MANAGER_ID),
	{Max SALARY} = max(toInteger(SALARY))) ~> Aggregate1
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		MANAGER_ID = Aggregate1@MANAGER_ID,
		{Avg Employees SALARY} = {Max SALARY},
		EMPLOYEE_ID,
		FIRST_NAME,
		LAST_NAME,
		EMAIL,
		PHONE_NUMBER,
		HIRE_DATE,
		JOB_ID,
		SALARY,
		COMMISSION_PCT,
		DEPARTMENT_ID
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Aggregate1, source1 lookup(Aggregate1@MANAGER_ID == EMPLOYEE_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Select1, sourceDepartments lookup(Select1@DEPARTMENT_ID == sourceDepartments@DEPARTMENT_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup2
Lookup2 select(mapColumn(
		MANAGER_ID = Select1@MANAGER_ID,
		{Manager SALARY} = SALARY,
		{Avg Employees SALARY},
		EMPLOYEE_ID,
		FIRST_NAME,
		LAST_NAME,
		EMAIL,
		PHONE_NUMBER,
		HIRE_DATE,
		JOB_ID,
		COMMISSION_PCT,
		DEPARTMENT_ID = Select1@DEPARTMENT_ID,
		DEPARTMENT_NAME,
		LOCATION_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
